hww-config:message.text: I'm the luckiest guy.
You make me complete.
You look beautiful as always.
Where have you been? I missed you.
Hi sweetie, what can I get you today?
I can't imagine life without you.
I love you unconditionally.
Hi honey, what can I do for you today.
What do you like to do?
You have a hot body.
Your legs are very toned.
I never want to lose you, baby.
What a nice day. We should go shopping.
You are the most beautiful woman in the world.
Hey cutie pie.
I'm glad I have you in my life.
You make me want to be a better man.
You look absolutely gorgeous.
I love the dress you are wearing. Hot.
Wow, you are stunning!
You are such a strong and confident woman.
I hope I get a promotion at work soon.
Don't leave me!
I love you.
You mean the world to me.
Tell me what's on your mind. I want to listen.
How can I make it up to you?
What would make you happy right now?
I want to kiss you all night.
I've been thinking of you.
I'm glad I woke up with you by my side.
You smell nice.
I'll make you dinner tonight.
Let's go on a date.
I'm sorry. You are always right.
I don't feel complete without you.
I appreciate all the things you do around the house.
Thank you for being you.
Thank you for taking care of me.
You make each day brighter.
Every time you kiss me, you electrify me.
I love watching your mouth move.
You are the most amazing woman I've ever met.
I can't wait to grow old together.
I've been dreaming about you.
I want to buy you a big house some day.
I hope I get a promotion soon.
My team counts on me.
My wife deserves the best in anything she wants.
I feel energetic. Do you want to go shopping after work?
Everyday brings new opportunities.
I have a dream wife and a dream job.
I can't wait to get home to see my beautiful wife.
I love being challenged at work.
My wife is # 1 priority.
I've been feeling tired lately.
I haven't' seen my buddies for a while.
It would be nice to take a day off.
How have I let you down?
Do you love me?
You are acting like your mother.
Bad hair day?
It must be that time of the month.
Nobody listens to me at work.
I'm overwhelmed with what's going on at work.
I'm really stressed out.
I can't go on like this.
Help me!
You don't care how I feel.
I don't want to go to work.
I don't have anything left in my tank.
I see ghost.
I am seeing things.
I can't think straight.
I'm hallucinating.
I've fallen in love with you many times.
I love you just the way you are.
You are the most important thing in my life.
I'm the luckiest guy to have you as my wife.
I love you more than life itself.
Love for you can never grow old.
Your love keeps me going.
I'm deeply in love with you.
Gosh, how did I get so lucky?
I would do anything for you.
I've been feeling a little lonely.
When was the last time we went on a date?
I miss homemade meals.
I miss being with you.
Do you love me?
Kiss me.
We never see each other.
Don't you think we should spend more time together?
I miss you.
What have you been up to?
Don't abandon me. I love you.
Why don't you understand how much I love you?
Did you find someone else?
What did I do wrong?
Don't tell me it's over.
How can I fix our relationship?
What went wrong?
I'm hungry for your love.
Can you make me my favoriate meal?
Let's go to the place where we met on our first date.
